title: Burkina Faso: How armed conflict cost lives in troubled African nation in 2021
description: Burkina Faso, the landlocked west African nation, reported yet another news of multiple killings with at least 41 people dying in an armed rebel attack in its troubled northern region. The latest atrocity in Burkina Faso occurred when suspected jihadists killed 41 people. The ambush targeted a convo...
